name: Brew The Word
description:
Enjoy Anagrams? Or crosswords? Here is a simple game that combines the best of both - Just arrange the given jumbled letters on the given crossword layout, to form valid words. The more seconds left on the clock - the more points you earn!

A host of features make Brew The Word a must for every word game fan! This new updated version comes with -

- 5 different levels of difficulty to test your word skills! Work your way up from the 6 to the 10 letter puzzle modes.
- A separate difficulty level where the number of alphabets in a puzzle, are increased as you complete rounds.
- Hundreds of puzzles in every level, with different configurations, to provide endless hours of fun
- 3 options for time per round
- Global Leaderboards for you to compare your scores with players worldwide
- Automatically saves scores even without logging into Game Center.
